A1.ThemeDescription: This chapter focuses on the journey of artists creating their masterpieces for a major upcoming international art exhibition.
A1.StuctureInstruction: The narrative structure is WideMerge, where Two initial chapters, each focusing on separate themes related to an art exhibition, converge into a shared theme in the subsequent chapter. (eg. A1 -> B2; C1 -> B2). The current chapter node is A1, which is the 1th chapter node in the narrative structure.
